dc_title_s: Provincial Boundary: Inner Mongolia Province, China, 2000
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the provincial boundary for the Inner Mongolia province of China for 2000. These data are represented at 1:1,000,000 scale. This layer is part of the China 2000 township population census dataset.The 2000 China township maps are developed for matching 2000 China population Census data, which should only be used as references for research or education instead of used as official maps.
dc_publisher_s: Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center
Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
